item.title: GALECA Announces Diane Anderson-Minshall as First Female Executive Director and New Board of Directors
item.description: GALECA, The Society of LGBTQ Entertainment Critics, has announced that Diane Anderson-Minshall, former CEO of Pride Media has been named executive director, alongside a new board of directors. Anderso
